com.c77.androidstreamingclient.lib.rtp

Class OriginalRtpMediaExtractor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.c77.androidstreamingclient.lib.rtp.RtpMediaExtractor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.biasedbit.efflux.session.RtpSessionDataListener, MediaExtractor

    public class OriginalRtpMediaExtractor
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.biasedbit.efflux.session.RtpSessionDataListener, MediaExtractor
    RTP Extractor that takes packets, creates frames and sends them to the decoder. It has all the knowledge to parse H.264 packets, create frames from them and send them according to the specs.
    Author:
    Julian Cerruti

      • getMediaFormat

        public MediaFormat getMediaFormat()
        Retrieves an Android MediaFormat for H.264, 640x480 video codec. SPS and PPS are hardcoded to the ones used by libstreaming. TODO: Think how to get CSD-0/CSD-1 codec-specific data chunks
        Specified by:
        getMediaFormat in interface MediaExtractor
